resources.string:
Download spam numbers from %s and import them into local database.

The workflow runs daily, it downloads the entire list on the first run, then performs only incremental updates on all subsequent runs.
Workflow not saved, save it first.

Save a tag value to reuse it in future workflow runs.

It\'s tied to the workflow and will be automatically deleted when the workflow is deleted.

Use case:
  In scenarios involving incremental updates, a pointer-like variable must be saved and reused across successive runs.
Load a tag that was saved earlier.
